node.name: Shivalik Sleeping Bag(1 Person) MAKE: TRIPOLE
node.description: Toasty warm inside, internal pocket and extra padding for comfort, the shivalik sleeping bag can resist the temperature of -10`Celsius. It is a type of down sleeping bag which is more durable and absorb no moisture from ground & air. (SIZE: 1800x600mm / WEIGHT: 2.1 Kg)
node.content: Tripole the Indian brand, known for the quality rucksacks came out with this shivalik sleeping bag which is a type of down sleeping bag that can resist the temperature about -10'Celcius and do not get any moisture even lay over direct ground / With dual zipper it is easy to zip the entire bag from inside and Velcro mechanism block the moisture entrance through entire length of zipper / Elastic cords are provided at chest level for tightening and reducing space to make cozy effect that further helps in heat retention / Very basic modification or creative thing that is provided is internal pockets for storing cellphone, torch or water bottle which may called sleep essentials / Extra padding is provided over chest and head for comfort and pillow respectively while the sleeping bag size can fit a full grown 6 feet guy with net weight is under 2.1 Kg

node.name: Sleeping Bag Cum Mattress(1 Person) MAKE: INDITRADITION
node.description: With bearing temperature of -5`Celsius and comfort like home quilt, this quality sleeping bag is made by Indian brand. Its all weather nature, and size for 6' feet person makes perfect to put it in necessary item of camping. A perfect sleeping bag for solo traveller. (SIZE: 1800x600mm / WEIGHT: 2.1 Kg)
node.content: Another Make in India product which pack with hollow cotton filling and not synthetic cotton and that’s how this sleeping bag resist the temperature up to -5`Celsius / With convertible design, sleeping bag turns into mattress which add up the factor of comfort for those who are new users of sleeping bag / Envelope layer of sleeping bag is of waterproof material and sleeping bag is good to use in Autumn, Winters and Rainy nights / Cocoon shape of bag is of size 1800mm x 600mm which is perfect for rotation at time of sleeping / It come inside the bag pack, even lightweight and net weight of sleeping bag is under 2.1 Kg. Although manufacturer recommend that it is machine washable but user said wet wipe and dry under sun makes good care.
node.alt: Inditradition Ultralight Camping Sleeping Bag for Adults | Waterproof, All Season Compatible, Blue (6.5 Feet)

node.name: Pathfinder Sleeping Bag(1 Person) MAKE: COLEMAN
node.description: Extra light and compact with bearing temperature up to -18` Celcius, this sleeping bag has enough space for 7 feet tall guy. With micro insulation and polyester lining, the packsack comes with a compression valve. (SIZE: 2200x800mm / WEIGHT: 1.7 Kg)
node.content: Lightweight compact sleeping bag with cozy micro insulation and brushed polyester lining, the packsack comes with a compression valve for compact storage and transportation which is ideal for hiking and biking / Sleeping bag has a hood which provides additional warmth and insulation, the thermolock construction reduces heat loss through the zipper at entire length / Warm sleeping bag built for 3 seasons temperatures, comfort temperature -2 Celsius and extreme temperature -18 Celsius / Ziploc prevents the zipper snagging by keeping fabric away from the zipper / The camping sleeping bag has a durable outer fabric of polyester, comfortable lining of brushed polyester and insulation of 100g/m square Colet herm micro / Dimension: 2200 x 800 x 500 mm(Sleeping Bag) & 400 x 400 x 650 mm(Packsack) / Net weight including packsack is under 1.7 kg which is category of extra light in camping sleeping bags.
node.alt: Coleman Pathfinder Mummy Sleeping Bag, Temp -18 °C to + 3 °C, 1.7 Kg
